menuItem.name: Poached Chicken Rice
menuItem.description: Poached chicken served on a bed of fragrant, aromatic rice, accompanied by fresh cucumber slices and Nicki’s signature homemade chili sauce for a flavorful kick.

menuItem.name: Roasted Chicken Rice
menuItem.description: Roasted chicken served on a bed of fragrant, aromatic rice, accompanied by fresh cucumber slices and Nicki’s signature homemade chili sauce for a flavorful kick.
